Class# MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerDescriptor

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 18.0+

```
class MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerDescriptor
```
